$comment: Template for bug fix PRDs. Replace {{VAR}} placeholders with actual values.

userStories.title: Bug Investigation and Root Cause Analysis
userStories.description: Investigate the bug to identify the root cause and affected areas
acceptanceCriteria: Identify the root cause of the issue
Identify all code areas affected by the bug

userStories.title: Implement Bug Fix
userStories.description: Implement the fix for the identified bug
acceptanceCriteria: Fix the root cause of the bug
Ensure the fix doesn't introduce new issues
Handle any related edge cases discovered
Verify the fix resolves the original issue

userStories.title: Add Regression Tests
userStories.description: Add tests to prevent regression of this bug
acceptanceCriteria: Add unit test that would have caught this bug
Tests fail without the fix, pass with the fix

userStories.title: Verification and Documentation
userStories.description: Verify the fix and document the resolution
acceptanceCriteria: Verify bug is fixed in all affected scenarios
Document the fix in relevant places
Close related issue/ticket with resolution notes
